00040 const char CommitLog::MAGIC_DATA[10] = { 'C','O','M','M','I','T','D','A','T','A' };
00041 const char CommitLog::MAGIC_LINK[10] = { 'C','O','M','M','I','T','L','I','N','K' };

00043 
00044 CommitLog::~CommitLog() {
00045   delete m_compressor;
00046   close();
00047 }
00048 
00049 void CommitLog::initialize(Filesystem *fs, const String &log_dir, PropertiesPtr &props_ptr) {
00050   String compressor;
00051   m_fs = fs;
00052   m_log_dir = log_dir;
00053   m_cur_fragment_length = 0;
00054   m_cur_fragment_num = 0;
00055   m_last_timestamp = 0;
00056 
00057   if (props_ptr) {
00058     m_max_fragment_size = props_ptr->get_int64("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.RollLimit", 100000000LL);
00059     compressor = props_ptr->get("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.Compressor", "lzo");
00060   }
00061   else {
00062     m_max_fragment_size = 268435456LL;
00063     compressor = "lzo";
00064   }
00065 
00066   HT_INFOF("RollLimit = %lld", m_max_fragment_size);
00067 
00068   m_compressor = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(compressor);
00069 
00070   FileUtils::add_trailing_slash( m_log_dir );
00071 
00072   m_cur_fragment_fname = m_log_dir + m_cur_fragment_num;
00073 
00074   try {
00075     m_fs->mkdirs(m_log_dir);
00076     m_fd = m_fs->create(m_cur_fragment_fname, true, 8192, 3, 67108864);
00077   }
00078   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00079     HT_ERRORF("Problem initializing commit log '%s' - %s (%s)", m_log_dir.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00080     throw;
00081   }
00082 }

00090 uint64_t CommitLog::get_timestamp() {
00091   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00092   boost::xtime now;
00093   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00094   return ((uint64_t)now.sec * 1000000000LL) + (uint64_t)now.nsec;
00095 }

00103 int CommitLog::write(DynamicBuffer &buffer, uint64_t timestamp) {
00104   int error;
00105   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header(MAGIC_DATA, timestamp);
00106 
00110   if ((error = compress_and_write(buffer, &header, timestamp)) != Error::OK)
00111     return error;
00112 
00116   if (m_cur_fragment_length > m_max_fragment_size) {
00117     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00118     error = roll();
00119   }
00120   else
00121     error = Error::OK;
00122 
00123   return error;
00124 }

00130 int CommitLog::link_log(CommitLogBase *log_base, uint64_t timestamp) {
00131   int error;
00132   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header(MAGIC_LINK, timestamp);
00133   DynamicBuffer input;
00134   String &log_dir = log_base->get_log_dir();
00135 
00136   input.ensure( header.length() );
00137 
00138   header.set_compression_type(BlockCompressionCodec::NONE);
00139   header.set_data_length( log_dir.length() + 1 );
00140   header.set_data_zlength( log_dir.length() + 1 );
00141   header.set_data_checksum( fletcher32(log_dir.c_str(), log_dir.length()+1) );
00142 
00143   header.encode(&input.ptr);
00144   input.add( log_dir.c_str(), log_dir.length() + 1 );
00145 
00146   try {
00147     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00148     size_t amount = input.fill();
00149     StaticBuffer send_buf(input);
00150 
00151     m_fs->append(m_fd, send_buf, Filesystem::O_FLUSH);
00152     m_last_timestamp = timestamp;
00153     m_cur_fragment_length += amount;
00154 
00155     if ((error = roll()) != Error::OK)
00156       return error;
00157 
00158     // Stitch in the fragment queue from the log being linked
00159     // in to the current fragment queue of the current log
00160     stitch_in( log_base );
00161 
00162   }
00163   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00164     HT_ERRORF("Problem linking external log into commit log - %s", e.what());
00165     return e.code();
00166   }
00167 
00168   return Error::OK;
00169 }

00175 int CommitLog::close() {
00176 
00177   try {
00178     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00179     if (m_fd > 0)
00180       m_fs->close(m_fd);
00181   }
00182   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00183     HT_ERRORF("Problem closing commit log file '%s' - %s (%s)",
00184               m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00185     return e.code();
00186   }
00187     
00188   m_fd = 0;
00189 
00190   return Error::OK;
00191 }

00198 int CommitLog::purge(uint64_t timestamp) {
00199   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00200   CommitLogFileInfo file_info;
00201   String fname;
00202 
00203   try {
00204 
00205     while (!m_fragment_queue.empty()) {
00206       file_info = m_fragment_queue.front();
00207       if (file_info.timestamp > 0 && file_info.timestamp < timestamp) {
00208         fname = file_info.log_dir + file_info.num;
00209         m_fs->remove(fname);
00210         m_fragment_queue.pop_front();
00211         HT_INFOF("Removed log fragment file='%s' timestamp=%lld", fname.c_str(), file_info.timestamp);
00212       }
00213       else {
00214         //HT_INFOF("LOG FRAGMENT PURGE breaking because %lld >= %lld", file_info.timestamp, timestamp);
00215         break;
00216       }
00217     }
00218 
00219   }
00220   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00221     HT_ERRORF("Problem purging log fragment fname = '%s'", fname.c_str());
00222     return e.code();
00223   }
00224 
00225   return Error::OK;
00226 }

00228 
00232 int CommitLog::roll() {
00233   CommitLogFileInfo file_info;
00234 
00235   try {
00236 
00237     m_fs->close(m_fd);
00238 
00239     file_info.log_dir = m_log_dir;
00240     file_info.num = m_cur_fragment_num;
00241     file_info.size = m_cur_fragment_length;
00242     file_info.timestamp = m_last_timestamp;
00243     file_info.purge_log_dir = false;
00244     file_info.block_stream = 0;
00245 
00246     m_fragment_queue.push_back(file_info);
00247 
00248     m_last_timestamp = 0;
00249     m_cur_fragment_length = 0;
00250 
00251     m_cur_fragment_num++;
00252     m_cur_fragment_fname = m_log_dir + m_cur_fragment_num;
00253 
00254     m_fd = m_fs->create(m_cur_fragment_fname, true, 8192, 3, 67108864);
00255   }
00256   catch (Exception &e) {
00257     HT_ERRORF("Problem rolling commit log: %s: %s",
00258               m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what());
00259     return e.code();
00260   }
00261 
00262   return Error::OK;
00263 }

00270 int CommitLog::compress_and_write(DynamicBuffer &input, BlockCompressionHeader *header, uint64_t timestamp) {
00271   int error = Error::OK;
00272   EventPtr event_ptr;
00273   DynamicBuffer zblock;
00274 
00275   // Compress block and kick off log write (protected by lock)
00276   try {
00277     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00278 
00279     if ((error = m_compressor->deflate(input, zblock, *header)) != Error::OK)
00280       return error;
00281 
00282     size_t amount = zblock.fill();
00283     StaticBuffer send_buf(zblock);
00284 
00285     m_fs->append(m_fd, send_buf, Filesystem::O_FLUSH);
00286     m_last_timestamp = timestamp;
00287     m_cur_fragment_length += amount;
00288   }
00289   catch (Exception &e) {
00290     HT_ERRORF("Problem writing commit log: %s: %s",
00291               m_cur_fragment_fname.c_str(), e.what());
00292     error = e.code();
00293   }
00294 
00295   return error;
00296 }

00303 void CommitLog::load_fragment_priority_map(LogFragmentPriorityMap &frag_map) {
00304   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00305   uint64_t cumulative_total = m_cur_fragment_length;
00306   uint32_t distance = 0;
00307   LogFragmentPriorityData frag_data;
00308 
00309   frag_data.distance = distance++;
00310   frag_data.cumulative_size = cumulative_total;
00311   frag_map[m_last_timestamp] = frag_data;
00312 
00313   for (deque<CommitLogFileInfo>::reverse_iterator iter = m_fragment_queue.rbegin(); iter != m_fragment_queue.rend(); iter++) {
00314     cumulative_total += (*iter).size;
00315     frag_data.distance = distance++;
00316     frag_data.cumulative_size = cumulative_total;
00317     frag_map[(*iter).timestamp] = frag_data;
00318   }
00319   
00320 }
